description.value:
You reach out and pluck a flame from its fuel source, then effortlessly carry it to a new location.

Alternative Reward: Fey Magic Gift - Uncommon

Power âœ¦ Encounter (Minor Action)

Effect: You pick up an adjacent fire, carrying it with a free hand without being burned. The fire requires no fuel while you carry it, and it can be as large as a torch flame. You can place the fire on a surface or an unattended object as a minor action. You cannot place it on a creature. Once out of your hand, the fire requires fuel as normal. If you are still carrying the fire at the end of the encounter, the fire goes out.
